edge_1: Both musicians, Sharon Isbin and G. E. Smith, contributed to the score of the movie 'The Departed' in 2006.
edge_2: Both musicians, G. E. Smith and Larry Saltzman, participated in the creation of the soundtrack for 'The Departed' in 2006.
edge_3: Both musicians, Larry Saltzman and Marc Ribot, were involved in creating the score for 'The Departed' directed by Martin Scorsese in 2006.
